column3: Ranulf wants to help the Barber.
Scatter the fine powder at the designated location and obtain a bottle of antlion secretion from the antlion ambusher.
Deliver the bottle of antlion secretion to Ranulf.
Think you'd be able to lend me a hand?

I've been trying to gather supplies for the Barber. While I've managed to get some blankets and bandages, I've not been able to procure any disinfectant. That's what I need your help for─I want you to bring me a bottle of antlion secretion.
I'll collect the other ingredients I need. I just need you to slay an antlion.
Only the antlions that dwell beneath the earth secrete the kind of liquid I need. Use this to draw them to the surface.
It's a powder made of crushed ants, their favorite food. Scatter it anywhere they're known to dwell and you'll be faced with one in no time at all.
Head to Virdjala in the Fringes. You'll not struggle to find an antlion there.
Scatter that powder in Virdjala and slay any antlions that come to the surface. Don't forget to collect the liquid they secrete!
Exactly what I needed. I'll be able to make enough disinfectant to last a while with this.
Even the smallest of wounds can be fatal if they become infected. We can't let the Barber run out of the stuff.
